discover() discoverView Viewdiscover
static discover (bool $force = false , bool $only_lis = false , string $tag_filter = "" , string $string_filter = "" , int $page = 1 , string $sort = 'sort-alpha-asc' )[static]
Display discover tab (all availble plugins)
Paramètres
bool$force_refresh
do not rely on cache to get plugins list
bool$only_lis
display only the li tags in return html (used by ajax queries)
string$tag_filter
filter the plugin list by given tag
string$string_filter
filter the plugin by given string
int$page
What's sub page of plugin we want to display
string$sort
sort-alpha-asc|sort-alpha-desc|sort-dl|sort-update|sort-added|sort-note
Renvoie
void display things

displayList() displayListView ViewdisplayList
static displayList (array $plugins = [] , string $tab = "" , bool $only_lis = false , int $nb_plugins = 0 , string $sort = 'sort-alpha-asc' , bool $is_list_truncated = false )[static]
Display a list of plugins
Paramètres
array$plugins
list of plugins returned by
\Plugin::getList
\Glpi\Marketplace\Api\Plugins::getPaginatedPlugins
string$tab
current display tab (discover or installed)
bool$only_lis
display only the li tags in return html (used by ajax queries)
int$nb_plugins
total of plugins ($plugins contains only the current page)
string$sort
sort-alpha-asc|sort-alpha-desc|sort-dl|sort-update|sort-added|sort-note
Renvoie
false|void displays things

getPluginIcon() getPluginIconView ViewgetPluginIcon
static getPluginIcon (array $plugin = [] )[static]
Return HTML part for plugin logo/icon
Paramètres
array$plugin
data of the plugin. If it contains a key logo_url, the current will be inserted in a img tag else, it will use initials from plugin friendly name to construct a short and colored logo
Renvoie
string the jtml for plugin logo
